revision.text: Possibly: A translation of Scherffer's treatise on the emendation of dioptrical telescopes ... To which are added, explanatory notes ; and a description of a telescope to be used at sea ... By Samuel Hardy. (Carl Scherffer). (London : George Pearch, 1768). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/951558127
